text: Guo Hua (born 30 July 1971) is a Chinese former professional snooker player. ==Career== The best result of Guo Hua is to reach the top 32 in the 1994 Thailand Open. In the round of wild cards, he won 5–3 Dave Finbow in the best 32 losing 2–5 with Neal Foulds. in 2018 he played in the Shanghai Masters tournament as a wild cardman losing in the best 24 with the Australian snooker player Neil Robertson. ==Performance and rankings timeline== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" |- bgcolor="#efefef" !
